Posts.Content: Thanks again everyone and special thanks to Jayne posting an update on whilst we were in London. I've added an a little info on my profile about what was discussed if anyone wants to know anymore about it, as Mayte has only been back afew hours and is off on a course learning how to fix and build motorbikes. So for the first time in 9 months I'm home alone ;( feels very strange!!! xxxxxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Escoffier (aka Mayte, Scoffy, Dishy Chefie etc) - at last some good...

Posts.Content: My goodness, with all these positive vibes who needs power stations! lol Thank you so much to everyone for their hugs and love over the weekend and for sharing all your invaluabe information and advice. Me and Mayte were really touched and we wouldn't have missed it for the world. First we were deflated, then annoyed and angry and then upset. But we are moving onwards and forwards and taking the "bull by the horns" as Mayte says and we ain't giving up just cos of this crappy disease. So all chant after me "Castanualas to Mr C!" And if you haven't had the pleasure of seeing Mayte's "Castanualas" then ask her to show you at Marsha's bash (we need a name for the party) Lots of love to ya all xxxxxx
Posts.Title: Escoffier (aka Mayte, Scoffy, Dishy Chefie etc) - at last some good...

Posts.Content: Hi Carole Mayte shouted to me about the good news the other day..how fantastic..Only just been told you won't be at the party so thought I'd come on here and leave you a message. Big hugs xxxxx
